original_title: 澄んだ瞳に笑顔咲く。奇跡の人妻に僕らは出会った 相馬茜 32歳 AV DEBUT
overview: One day, Akane Soma, a married woman who applied for an AV appearance. Sexless with her husband who lived in Hiroshima and became like a family. In addition, he seems to be spending unforgettable days having sex with his ex-boyfriend. The first impression I had when I saw the photo sent was "Why is such a beautiful married woman?" Immediately, I went to Hiroshima to meet Akane. The Japan Longitudinal Affair Document has begun.
title: Calm Eyes, And A Blossoming Smile. We Met A Miraculous Married Woman Akane Soma 32 Years Old Her Adult Video Debut
